ComicInfo.Characters: Death of the Endless,Dream of the Endless (Morpheus)
ComicInfo.Locations: Greenwich Village,Manhattan,New York City,New York State,Washington Square Park
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:33:49 [Issue ID 4000-31513] urn:comicvine:4000-31513
ComicInfo.Summary:
Spend a day with Dream as he catches up with his younger sister, Death, in search of inspiration. When the King of Dreams is depressed, can even a pep talk from Death set him on the right path?
Morpheus having completed his quest for his artifacts seems lost and without purpose, until he receives a visit from his big sister, Death. Accompanying Death for the day revitalizes Dream and renews his sense of purpose.
Notes:
Ranked #2 in Wizard Magazine's list of "100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born".

ComicInfo.Title: Master of Dreams, Part 8: The Sound of Her Wings
